rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 24 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 6:07 PM, 21 June 2025(Saturday)



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Cavite and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Dinalupihan, Orani, Hermosa, Samal, Abucay, Balanga, Morong, Bagac), Pampanga(Lubao, Floridablanca, Masantol, Macabebe, Sasmuan, Guagua, Porac), Bulacan(Hagonoy, Calumpit), Zambales(Masinloc, Palauig, Botolan, Iba, Cabangan, San Antonio), Nueva Ecija(Carranglan, Lupao, Nampicuan, Cuyapo), Tarlac(San Manuel, Anao, Moncada, San Jose, Capas), Metro Manila(Manila, Makati, Pasay, Mandaluyong, San Juan, Marikina), Rizal(Antipolo, Taytay, San Mateo), Laguna(Santa Cruz, Magdalena, Liliw, Pila, Pagsanjan) and Quezon(Sampaloc, Mauban) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
